attributes.action: Compel Cash rich companies not to pay the Minimum Statutory Redudancy Pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some cash rich companies are looking to reduce their staff costs by making redundancies and in turn paying the statutory minimum redundancy pay. 

For those under 40 is one weeks pay for every year worked. So this can be a cheap way of reducing staff numbers.

If they were required to pay a greater and fairer amount e.g 1 months they would then think twice about throwing people on the dole queue.
